input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: When the weather starts to turn cold, make sure you're ready to show your support for your favorite team with this MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Terry Full-Zip. This comfortable and stylish shirt is perfect for any fan, whether you're wearing it at the stadium or just out and about. It features a bold team logo on the chest, as well as a woven label and self-fabric applique for added detail. Made with cotton and organic cotton, it's sure to keep you warm all season long.
input_text.Response B: Ooh! Ooh! Look at this cool shirt! 😍 It's for the Philadelphia Phillies, and it's so soft and comfy! 🥰 It's made of cotton, but not just any cotton - it's organic cotton, so it's good for the environment! 🌿 And it has a fun mock neck and long sleeves, so you can stay warm and stylish! 💁‍♀️ The best part? It has a cool full-zip and a woven label, so you can show off your team spirit! 👍 Plus, it's made in Egypt, so you know it's high quality! 🇪🇹 So, do you want this awesome shirt? 🤔

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
